ygData.subject: Re: Cure Blindness
ygData.msgSnippet: ... cure blindness real quick.  Not to mention any other time one of your party members gets blinded.  Or..  If you yourself get blinded while soloing it kinda
ygData.messageBody:
> Go fight muddites in beholder. You'll find a pretty damn good use for
cure blindness real quick. Not to mention any other time one of your
party members gets blinded. Or.. If you yourself get blinded while
soloing it kinda puts a kink in your gameplan. Not being able to see
what's going on can cost you your life. As with a few other cure
spells, it sometimes has to be cast more than once to be effective. <

I have been using Cancel Magic effectively against the blindness that the Muddites cause. I have one question: Is it significantly faster to cast a Cure Blindness than Cancel Magic? I know cancel magic uses 50% more mana but it is so little anyway (20 -> 30) that there is no point in purchasing the spell just for that. Besides the cancel magic works for a wider variety of things. Very useful when you are rooted, isn't it? Is there anything that could cause blindness and that cancel magic could not cure?
